body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/dvmdb/adom/{{adom}}/script",
            "data": [
                {
                    "script_schedule": null,
                    "name": "Step_2_Hub_1_ADVPN_&_BGP_Configuration",
                    "type": "cli",
                    "desc": "",
                    "content": "# BGP and Health Check Looopback Hub_1_ADVPN_&_BGP_Configuration

#Static Routes

config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
    edit \"WAN_ID1_0\"
        set auto-discovery-sender enable
    next
    edit \"WAN_ID2_0\"
        set auto-discovery-sender enable
    next
    edit \"WAN_ID3_0\"
        set auto-discovery-sender enable
    next
end



config router community-list
    edit \"Routes_from_PIP\"
        config rule
            edit 10
                set action permit
                set match \"7604:0\"
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_Overlay\"
        config rule
            edit 10
                set action permit
                set match \"1331:0\"
            next
        end
    next
end

#
#
#

config router prefix-list
    edit \"BGP_with_PE\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix {{Hub1_FGT_IP}} 255.255.255.255
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_PE\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix 10.50.0.0 255.255.0.0
            next
            edit 2
                set prefix 10.20.100.0 255.255.255.0
            next
            edit 3
                set prefix 10.20.200.0 255.255.255.0
            next
            edit 4
                set prefix 159.24.76.144 255.255.255.240
            next
            edit 5
                set prefix 205.223.104.0 255.255.255.0
            next
            edit 6
                set prefix 205.223.105.0 255.255.255.0
            next
            edit 7
                set prefix 159.24.76.176 255.255.255.240
            next
            edit 8
                set prefix 153.39.115.20 255.255.255.255
            next
            edit 9
                set prefix 206.64.200.122 255.255.255.255
            next
            edit 10
                set prefix 192.168.209.24 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 11
                set prefix 192.168.209.28 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 12
                set prefix 192.168.216.0 255.255.255.240
            next
            edit 13
                set prefix 192.168.216.216 255.255.255.248
            next
            edit 14
                set prefix 192.168.254.128 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 15
                set prefix 192.168.254.132 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 16
                set prefix 192.168.254.140 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 17
                set prefix 192.168.254.136 255.255.255.252
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_to_Spokes\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix 10.50.0.0 255.255.0.0
                set ge 24
                set le 24
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_Spokes\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix 10.50.0.0 255.255.0.0
                set ge 24
                set le 24
            next
        end
    next
end

#
#
#

config router route-map
    edit \"BGP_with_PE\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set match-community \"Routes_from_Overlay\"
            next
            edit 2
                set match-ip-address \"BGP_with_PE\"
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_From_PE\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set match-ip-address \"Routes_from_PE\"
                set set-community \"701:0\"
                set set-local-preference 50
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_Spokes\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set match-community \"Routes_from_Overlay\"
                set match-ip-address \"Routes_from_Spokes\"
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_to_Spokes\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set action deny
                set match-community \"Routes_from_PIP\"
            next
            edit 2
                set set-community \"1331:0\"
                set match-ip-address \"Routes_to_Spokes\"
            next
        end
    next
end

#
#
#

config router bgp
    set as 1331
    set keepalive-timer 5
    set holdtime-timer 15
    set ibgp-multipath enable
    config neighbor
        edit \"{{Hub1_BGP_Neighbor_IP}}\"
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 701
            set local-as 7046
            set local-as-replace-as enable
            set route-map-in \"Routes_From_PE\"
            set route-map-out \"BGP_with_PE\"
        next
    end
    config neighbor-group
        edit \"WAN_Spokes_ID1\"
            set advertisement-interval 1
            set link-down-failover enable
            set next-hop-self enable
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in \"Routes_from_Spokes\"
            set route-map-out \"Routes_to_Spokes\"
            set update-source \"WAN_ID1_0\"
            set route-reflector-client enable
        next
        edit \"WAN_Spokes_ID2\"
            set advertisement-interval 1
            set link-down-failover enable
            set next-hop-self enable
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in \"Routes_from_Spokes\"
            set route-map-out \"Routes_to_Spokes\"
            set update-source \"WAN_ID2_0\"
            set route-reflector-client enable
        next
        edit \"WAN_Spokes_ID3\"
            set advertisement-interval 1
            set link-down-failover enable
            set next-hop-self enable
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in \"Routes_from_Spokes\"
            set route-map-out \"Routes_to_Spokes\"
            set update-source \"WAN_ID3_0\"
            set route-reflector-client enable
        next
    end
    config neighbor-range
        edit 1
            set prefix 10.10.1.0 255.255.255.0
            set neighbor-group \"WAN_Spokes_ID1\"
        next
        edit 2
            set prefix 10.10.2.0 255.255.255.0
            set neighbor-group \"WAN_Spokes_ID2\"
        next
        edit 3
            set prefix 10.10.3.0 255.255.255.0
            set neighbor-group \"WAN_Spokes_ID3\"
        next
    end
    config network
        edit 1
            set prefix {{Hub1_FGT_LAN}}
        next
        edit 2
            set prefix {{Hub1_FGT_IP}} 255.255.255.255
        next
    end
end


config router policy
    edit 1
        set input-device \"WAN_ID1_0\" \"WAN_ID2_0\"
        set srcaddr \"all\"
        set srcaddr \"all\"
        set output-device \"WAN_ID1_0\"
    next
    edit 2
        set input-device \"WAN_ID1_0\" \"WAN_ID2_0\"
        set srcaddr \"all\"
        set srcaddr \"all\"
        set output-device \"WAN_ID2_0\"
    next
    edit 3
        set input-device \"WAN_ID3_0\"
        set srcaddr \"all\"
        set srcaddr \"all\"
        set output-device \"WAN_ID3_0\"
    next
end
",

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/dvmdb/adom/{{adom}}/script",
            "data": [
                {
                    "script_schedule": null,
                    "name": "Hub_2_ADVPN_&_BGP_Configuration",
                    "type": "cli",
                    "desc": "",
                    "content": "# BGP and Health Check Looopback Hub_1_ADVPN_&_BGP_Configuration

config system interface
  edit \"HC_Loopback\"
    set vdom \"root\"
    set ip 10.200.99.1 255.255.255.255
    set allowaccess ping
    set type loopback
  next
end

config router community-list
    edit \"Routes_from_PIP\"
        config rule
            edit 10
                set action permit
                set match \"7604:0\"
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_Overlay\"
        config rule
            edit 10
                set action permit
                set match \"1331:0\"
            next
        end
    next
end

#
#
#

config router prefix-list
    edit \"BGP_with_PE\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix {{Hub2_FGT_IP}} 255.255.255.255
                unset ge
                unset le
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_PE\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix 10.50.0.0 255.255.0.0
            next
            edit 2
                set prefix 10.20.100.0 255.255.255.0
            next
            edit 3
                set prefix 10.20.200.0 255.255.255.0
            next
            edit 4
                set prefix 159.24.76.144 255.255.255.240
            next
            edit 5
                set prefix 205.223.104.0 255.255.255.0
            next
            edit 6
                set prefix 205.223.105.0 255.255.255.0
            next
            edit 7
                set prefix 159.24.76.176 255.255.255.240
            next
            edit 8
                set prefix 153.39.115.20 255.255.255.255
            next
            edit 9
                set prefix 206.64.200.122 255.255.255.255
            next
            edit 10
                set prefix 192.168.209.24 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 11
                set prefix 192.168.209.28 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 12
                set prefix 192.168.216.0 255.255.255.240
            next
            edit 13
                set prefix 192.168.216.216 255.255.255.248
            next
            edit 14
                set prefix 192.168.254.128 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 15
                set prefix 192.168.254.132 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 16
                set prefix 192.168.254.140 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 17
                set prefix 192.168.254.136 255.255.255.252
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_to_Spokes\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix 10.50.0.0 255.255.0.0
                set ge 24
                set le 24
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_Spokes\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix 10.50.0.0 255.255.0.0
                set ge 24
                set le 24
            next
        end
end

#
#
#

config router route-map
    edit \"BGP_with_PE\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set match-community \"Routes_from_Overlay\"
            next
            edit 2
                set match-ip-address \"BGP_with_PE\"
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_From_PE\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set match-ip-address \"Routes_from_PE\"
                set set-community \"701:0\"
                set set-local-preference 50
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_Spokes\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set match-community \"Routes_from_Overlay\"
                set match-ip-address \"Routes_from_Spokes\"
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_to_Spokes\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set action deny
                set match-community \"Routes_from_PIP\"
            next
            edit 2
                set set-community \"1331:0\"
                set match-ip-address \"Routes_to_Spokes\"
            next
        end
    next
end

#
#
#

config router bgp
    set as 1331
    set keepalive-timer 5
    set holdtime-timer 15
    set ibgp-multipath enable
    config neighbor
        edit \"{{Hub2_BGP_Neighbor_IP}}\"
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 701
            set local-as 7046
            set local-as-replace-as enable
            set route-map-in \"Routes_From_PE\"
            set route-map-out \"BGP_with_PE\"
        next
    end
    config neighbor-group
        edit \"WAN_Spokes_ID4\"
            set advertisement-interval 1
            set link-down-failover enable
            set next-hop-self enable
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in \"Routes_from_Spokes\"
            set route-map-out \"Routes_to_Spokes\"
            set update-source \"WAN_ID4_0\"
            set route-reflector-client enable
        next
        edit \"WAN_Spokes_ID5\"
            set advertisement-interval 1
            set link-down-failover enable
            set next-hop-self enable
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in \"Routes_from_Spokes\"
            set route-map-out \"Routes_to_Spokes\"
            set update-source \"WAN_ID5_0\"
            set route-reflector-client enable
        next
        edit \"WAN_Spokes_ID6\"
            set advertisement-interval 1
            set link-down-failover enable
            set next-hop-self enable
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in \"Routes_from_Spokes\"
            set route-map-out \"Routes_to_Spokes\"
            set update-source \"WAN_ID6_0\"
            set route-reflector-client enable
        next
    end
    config neighbor-range
        edit 1
            set prefix 10.10.4.0 255.255.255.0
            set neighbor-group \"WAN_Spokes_ID4\"
        next
        edit 2
            set prefix 10.10.5.0 255.255.255.0
            set neighbor-group \"WAN_Spokes_ID5\"
        next
        edit 3
            set prefix 10.10.6.0 255.255.255.0
            set neighbor-group \"WAN_Spokes_ID6\"
        next
    end
    config network
        edit 1
            set prefix {{Hub2_FGT_LAN}}
        next
        edit 2
            set prefix {{Hub2_FGT_IP}} 255.255.255.255
        next
    end
end

                {
                    "name": "Dual_Broadband_Spoke_BGP_Configs",
                    "type": "cli",
                    "desc": "BGP Configurations for Dual Broadband Spoke",
                    "content": "# BGP Configurations

config router community-list
    edit \"Routes_from_Overlay\"
        config rule
            edit 10
                set action permit
                set match \"1331:0\"
            next
        end
    next
end
#
#
#

config router prefix-list
    edit \"Routes_to_Hub\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix {{Spoke_LAN}}
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_Hub\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix 10.50.0.0 255.255.0.0
                set ge 24
                set le 24
            next
        end
    next
end

#
#
#

config router route-map
    edit \"Routes_from_Hub\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set match-community Routes_from_Overlay
                set match-ip-address Routes_from_Hub
            next
        end
    next
    edit Routes_to_Hub
        config rule
            edit 1
                set match-ip-address Routes_to_Hub
                set set-community 1331:0
            next
        end
    next
end
config router bgp
    set as 1331
    set keepalive-timer 5
    set holdtime-timer 15
    set ibgp-multipath enable
    set additional-path enable
    set additional-path-select 4
    config neighbor
        edit 10.10.1.250
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in Routes_from_Hub
            set route-map-out Routes_to_Hub
            set update-source WAN_ID1_0
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit 10.10.2.250
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in Routes_from_Hub
            set route-map-out Routes_to_Hub
            set update-source WAN_ID2_0
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit 10.10.4.250
            set advertisement-interval 1
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in Routes_from_Hub
            set route-map-out Routes_to_Hub
            set update-source WAN_ID4_0

        next
        edit 10.10.5.250
            set advertisement-interval 1
            set soft-reconfiguration enable

            set route-map-in Routes_from_Hub
            set route-map-out Routes_to_Hub

    config network

            set prefix {{Spoke_LAN}}

end

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/dvmdb/adom/{{adom}}/script",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "PIP_&_Broadband_Spoke_BGP_Configs",
                    "type": "cli",
                    "desc": "BGP Configurations for PIP + Broadband Spoke",
                    "content": "# BGP Configurations

config router community-list
    edit \"Routes_from_Overlay\"
        config rule
            edit 10
                set action permit
                set match \"1331:0\"
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_Overlay\"
        config rule
            edit 10
                set action permit
                set match \"1331:0\"
            next
        end
    next
end
#
#
#

config router prefix-list
    edit \"BGP_with_PE\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix \"{{Spoke_MGMT_LB_IP}} 255.255.255.255\"
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_PE\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix 10.50.0.0 255.255.0.0
            next
            edit 2
                set prefix 10.20.100.0 255.255.255.0
            next
            edit 3
                set prefix 10.20.200.0 255.255.255.0
            next
            edit 4
                set prefix 159.24.76.144 255.255.255.240
            next
            edit 5
                set prefix 205.223.104.0 255.255.255.0
            next
            edit 6
                set prefix 205.223.105.0 255.255.255.0
            next
            edit 7
                set prefix 159.24.76.176 255.255.255.240
            next
            edit 8
                set prefix 153.39.115.20 255.255.255.255
            next
            edit 9
                set prefix 206.64.200.122 255.255.255.255
            next
            edit 10
                set prefix 192.168.209.24 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 11
                set prefix 192.168.209.28 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 12
                set prefix 192.168.216.0 255.255.255.240
            next
            edit 13
                set prefix 192.168.216.216 255.255.255.248
            next
            edit 14
                set prefix 192.168.254.128 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 15
                set prefix 192.168.254.132 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 16
                set prefix 192.168.254.140 255.255.255.252
            next
            edit 17
                set prefix 192.168.254.136 255.255.255.252
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_to_Hub\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix 10.50.20.0 255.255.255.0
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_Hub\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set prefix 10.50.0.0 255.255.0.0
                set ge 24
                set le 24
            next
        end
    next
end

#
#
#

config router route-map
    edit \"BGP_with_PE\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set action deny
                set match-community \"Routes_from_Overlay\"
                set match-ip-address \"Routes_from_Hub\"
            next
            edit 2
                set match-ip-address \"BGP_with_PE\"
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_From_PE\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set match-ip-address \"Routes_from_PE\"
                set set-community \"701:0\"
                set set-local-preference 50
            next
        end
    next
    edit \"Routes_from_Hub\"
        config rule
            edit 1
                set match-community \"Routes_from_Overlay\"
                set match-ip-address \"Routes_from_Hub\"
            next
        end
    next
    edit Routes_to_Hub
        config rule
            edit 1
                set match-ip-address Routes_to_Hub
                set set-community 1331:0
            next
        end
    next
end
config router bgp
    set as 1331
    set keepalive-timer 5
    set holdtime-timer 15
    set ibgp-multipath enable
    set additional-path enable
    set additional-path-select 4
    config neighbor
        edit \"{{WAN_2_GW}}\"
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 701
            set local-as 7046
            set local-as-replace-as enable
            set route-map-in \"Routes_From_PE\"
            set route-map-out \"BGP_with_PE\"
        next
        edit 10.10.1.250
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in Routes_from_Hub
            set route-map-out Routes_to_Hub
            set update-source WAN_ID1_0
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit 10.10.3.250
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in Routes_from_Hub
            set route-map-out Routes_to_Hub
            set update-source WAN_ID3_0
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit 10.10.4.250
            set advertisement-interval 1
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in Routes_from_Hub
            set route-map-out Routes_to_Hub
            set update-source WAN_ID4_0
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit 10.10.6.250
            set advertisement-interval 1
            set soft-reconfiguration enable
            set remote-as 1331
            set route-map-in Routes_from_Hub
            set route-map-out Routes_to_Hub
            set update-source WAN_ID6_0
            set additional-path receive
        next
    end
    config network
        edit 1
            set prefix {{Spoke_LAN}}
        next
        edit 2
            set prefix {{Spoke_MGMT_LB_IP}} 255.255.255.255
        next
    end
end

config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
    edit \"WAN_ID1_0\"
        set auto-discovery-receiver enable
        set auto-discovery-shortcuts dependent
        set idle-timeout enable
        set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    next
    edit \"WAN_ID3_0\"
        set auto-discovery-receiver enable
        set auto-discovery-shortcuts dependent
        set idle-timeout enable
        set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    next
    edit \"WAN_ID4_0\"
        set auto-discovery-receiver enable
        set auto-discovery-shortcuts dependent
        set idle-timeout enable
        set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    next
    edit \"WAN_ID6_0\"
        set auto-discovery-receiver enable
        set auto-discovery-shortcuts dependent
        set idle-timeout enable
        set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    next
end
